attributes.action: consider employing retired or older professionals as social workers as his ministers have themselves suggested earlier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the latest 'chld abuse' tragedy and upon hearing of the Governments wish to employ retired/older social workers who might have greater 'life experience'..I duly applied (aged 62 with children and grandchildren..)Via an agency,was interviewed by Essex Social Services @ Chelmsford.Enjoyed the interview which went well and returned home to re-apply to the GCSW.This week I have been informed by the agency that 'although well qualified..I don't have enough recent knowledge to be considered.'
Well of course I am not uptodate with recent terms and legislation!
My question is " Do you want our experience/patience/knowledge/flexibility or not?" I spoke of training whilst at interview and would gladly engage with whatever was needed.
Please Prime Minister..use me and if not me, certainly other likeminded people in my position. If not..why not?
